title: Checkout Page Business Flow
description: Covers steps involved in the checkout process including guest login, billing, shipping, payment, and order confirmation.

steps.user_action: Access the checkout page from the cart
steps.expected_behavior: Redirects to the first step of the checkout process

steps.user_action: Choose between Guest Checkout or Login
steps.expected_behavior: System presents login form or billing details form based on selection

steps.user_action: Fill in billing details (First Name, Last Name, E-mail, Address, City, State, Zip/Postal Code, Phone Number)
steps.expected_behavior: Form fields are validated and saved for order processing
Shipping form is either auto-filled or separately validated
Shipping method selected and price updates if applicable
System displays dummy payment confirmation step
Order is placed and confirmation screen is shown

steps.user_action: Capture order reference or ID if available
steps.expected_behavior: User receives order number for tracking

steps.user_action: if already logged in, verify shipping address and payment method
steps.expected_behavior: System verifies saved addresses and payment methods for logged-in user

steps.user_action: if already logged in, edit shipping address and payment method
steps.expected_behavior: User can update shipping address and payment method before confirming order
